title: Ghosts of Earth
description: The Core are conquerors, wiping out worlds and civilisations without hesitation on their path to victory. For twenty years, they have been preparing the way for their hordes of warriors; manipulating others to do their dirty work.Many are willing to bow to them, or treat with them.But there are a brave few that will stand in their way.Can Adam Caine and his trusted allies stand and fight? Or will they be lost in the coming conflict?
author: John Charles Scott
